ROOT.GetJigaiData: select '项目编码' ,project_num ,'项目库别' , project_distinct,'项目流程状态' ,project_process_state,'项目类型' ,project_type , '项目开始时间' ,project_start_time,'项目结束时间' ,project_end_time,'项目起始年度' , project_start_year,'专业类别' , professional_category, '出资省单位' , contributi_province_unit,'总投资' ,total,'当年资金' ,current_year_totaal,'资产性质' ,assets_attr, '实施市单位' ,executive_city_unit ,'实施省单位',executive_province_unit,'编辑部门名称' ,dept_name,'电压等级' ,voltage_class, 'OBJ_ID' ,obj_id,'专业细分' ,professional_segmentation,'改造目的' , retrofit_aim ,'改造原因' ,retrofit_cause, '立项依据',create_project_basic, '项目内容',project_content, project_name FROM same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameysh_sc_jigai WHERE obj_id = {0}
